#summary Welcome to the memcached wiki
#labels Featured

----
The official memcached site is http://www.danga.com/memcached

 * [http://www.danga.com/memcached/download.bml Download] - official memcached server 
  * source code: [http://code.sixapart.com/svn/memcached svn]
  * current development (git) branches are [http://www.danga.com/memcached/download.bml here]

 * [Clients] - list of client APIs in various languages (for [http://pecl.php.net/package/memcache php], etc)

 * Ports
  * [PlatformWindows Windows] - memcached on Windows

 * Protocols
  * [http://code.sixapart.com/svn/memcached/trunk/server/doc/protocol.txt text protocol] - current memcached networking protocol
  * [MemcacheBinaryProtocol binary protocol] - forthcoming, optional protocol in development

 * [http://www.socialtext.net/memcached/index.cgi?hackathon Hackathons] - dates and topics on the proposed hackathons. Also, notes from previous hackathons.
